title: Remote Health Monitoring Dashboard
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want access to a comprehensive dashboard that displays real-time health metrics for my clients so that I can effectively monitor their well-being and respond promptly to any anomalies.

title: Health Data Alert Customization
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to customize alert settings for health metrics so that I receive notifications tailored to specific health concerns of my clients.

title: Care Task Progress Tracking
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to track the progress of care tasks assigned to my clients so that I can ensure timely completion and maintain accountability.

title: Secure User Consent Management
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want older adults to easily manage and revoke their consent for data sharing so that their privacy preferences are respected and I can access necessary health data securely.

title: Quick Access to Emergency Information
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want quick access to emergency contact information and critical health data so that I can respond effectively in urgent situations.

title: Integrated Communication Tools
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want integrated communication tools in ALFRED so that I can effectively interact with my elderly clients through messaging and video calls, ensuring clear communication and better coordination of care.
